exceptions.tactic: assert (Hlt: (Init.Nat.pred n < n)%nat) by (apply lt_pred_n_n; auto).
exceptions.exn: The reference n was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- S_pred with (m := Init.Nat.pred n); auto.
exceptions.exn: The reference n was not found in the current environment.

original: intros Hn Hex. assert (Hlt: (Init.Nat.pred n < n)%nat) by (apply lt_pred_n_n; auto). rewrite <- S_pred with (m := Init.Nat.pred n); auto.
